item.title: Model and Algorithm of Enhanced Oil Production in Daqing Oilfield
item.description:
• Optimized a streamlined production planning process by analyzing practical requirements, which entailed defining decision variables, objectives, and constraints while also identifying potential uncertainties in the system.
  • Engineered a production execution plan by constructing a deterministic multi-objective model, utilizing the NSGA-II based algorithm to optimize production outcomes.
  • Enhanced the model’s predictive accuracy by transitioning to a stochastic framework, introducing productivity as a random component, and integrating the deterministic algorithm with Monte Carlo simulations to represent chance constraints.
  • Achieved a drastic reduction in algorithm running time, decreasing it from 1 week to a mere 3 hours, facilitating a swift annual production planning process and significantly boosting overall oil production efficiency.
